tokens.text: validates file path length and format compatibility

title: Path Length
description: Validates file paths for length and format compatibility across platforms. Long paths can cause issues on some operating systems and storage systems.

fields.title: Deep Nesting
fields.description: Warning when a file path has more than 8 nested folder levels. Very deep folder structures can cause compatibility issues on some systems.
fields.howToUse: Flatten your folder structure by removing unnecessary subfolders. Move files closer to the pack root while keeping logical organization.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the depth count (number of directory segments)

fields.title: Path Too Long
fields.description: Error when a file's full path exceeds platform limits (typically 255 characters). Shorten folder and file names to ensure compatibility.
fields.howToUse: Shorten folder and file names to keep the total path under 255 characters. Use abbreviations where possible and avoid deeply nested structures.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path length in characters

fields.title: Mixed Case Path
fields.description: Recommendation to use only lowercase letters in file and folder names. Mixed case can cause issues on case-sensitive file systems.
fields.howToUse: Rename files and folders to use only lowercase letters. This prevents issues on case-sensitive systems like Linux. Example: 'MyTexture.png' â†’ 'mytexture.png'
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path with mixed case characters
